Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my sister
Reviews.Author: Neicey
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas present for my sister she travels a lot and she loved it she says it's easy to use and carry. The bundle came with a case a screen cleaner and a memory card it was a steal price

Reviews.Title: Ok camera
Reviews.Author: Raychelle
Reviews.Content: Its a great little camera but it is not a great point and shoot picture taker a lot of them come out blurry not what I expected for 16.2 MP

Reviews.Title: i like the camera very much,it  is what i expected.
Reviews.Author: passana henry "music/ movies"
Reviews.Content: I would recommend it to any body who like to post pictures on social network, it fast and easy to share.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied!!!
Reviews.Author: Trisha
Reviews.Content: I have found this camera has many functions and features but the common functions fall short. I am unsatisfied with the focus on the automatic setting function.  Nothing comes out clear.  Most of my pics are blurry!  I bought this point and shoot so I didn't have to carry my heavy DSLR for a vacation. I wanted the ease of turning the camera on and taking a quick picture. No other point and shoot that I've owned have I ever had a problem with focusing.  That is the concept of this type of camera.  I may be returning if I still can.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP CCD Image Sensor - ISO 100 to 12800
3.0" 230k-Dot LCD - Wi-Fi Direct, Email
25-125mm f/2.5 5x Optical Zoom Lens - 2D Panorama, Smart Auto, Smart Movie
Capture HD 720/30p Video - Face, Blink and Smile Detection
Direct LINK, Mobile Link, Remote VF - microSD/microSDHC Memory Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F 16.2MP w/ WiFi Ready Smart Compact Digital Camera in White + 8GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
